snippet: A selection of basketball coaches chime in on the recent, surprising success of the Knicks’ point guard Jeremy Lin.
abstract: Selection of former and current coaches from across the basketball spectrum, who comment on the unexpected success of New York Knicks point guard Jeremy Lin.
lead_paragraph: A selection of basketball coaches chime in on the recent, surprising success of the Knicks’ point guard Jeremy Lin.

headline.seo: Coaches Agree, in Jeremy Lin, Knicks Unearth a Diamond
headline.main: Coaches Say Knicks Have Found Someone Special
headline.print_headline: Coaches Say Knicks Have Found Someone Special
